name: Gym Rat (demo)
description:
When you joined the gym at the start of the new year, you never expected your heart to be getting the biggest workout...

GYM RAT is a game about finding your passions, on and off the running wheel. In this demo, you can take a step aerobics class and meet Norv (from the hit office simulator Coffee Break), a jovial older rat looking to supplement his love of bowling with something new.

Featuring:

  • Bowling and step-aerobics action!
  • Swoony neon lighting
  • 3 different endings
  • Gorgeous backgrounds, character art, and original soundtrack
  • The hope of someday playing the rest of the game if it ever gets finished!
